tasks.label: Start AVD: Pixel 9 Pro XL
args: $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; adb kill-server; $emupath = "$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Android\Sdk\emulator\emulator.exe"; Start-Process -FilePath $emupath -ArgumentList '-avd Pixel_9_Pro_XL -netdelay none -netspeed full -no-boot-anim' -WindowStyle Hidden; Write-Host '⏳ Esperando a que el emulador inicie...'; for ($i=0; $i -lt 120; $i++) { Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; $boot = adb shell getprop sys.boot_completed 2>$null; if ($boot -match '1') { Write-Host '✅ Emulador listo.'; exit 0 } }; Write-Error '❌ El emulador no completó el arranque a tiempo.'; exit 1;
